Name: Soulfire
About the game: Soulfire is a battle royale fighter that pits more than 20 teams against each other in a struggle for win.Compared to similar games, it features a 2.5D souls-lite combat system. Key words: Battle Royale / Multiplayer / Action / Side Scroller
